name: Good Carrots in the Bad Bunny Land
name_original: Good Carrots in the Bad Bunny Land
description:
Rescue the wrecked ships and bring the strained carrots backs to your home planet. But be aware that the Bad Bunny Empire will do everything possible to bring your doom.

The game was made to the Godot Wild Jam #34

Controls:

- Use the WASD keys to move

- Press 'E' to scan your surroundings

- Press 'Space' to activate turbo speed

Credits:
